text: Ciara is committed to spending time supporting husband Russell Wilson during his games with the Seattle Seahawks and frequently documents her attendance. But this time, the spouses ’ daughter stole the spotlight when fans marveled at how much she looks like her quarterback daddy. “ # GameDay! Let ’ s go!! # 3 # GoHawks, ” the “ Dose ” singer captioned the Sunday, Nov. 11 photo of her and 1 - year - old Princess Sienna Wilson. The mommy and daughter duo watched the Seahawks take on the Los Angeles Rams in a 36 - 31 game that went to the Rams. As Sienna and Ciara were cheering on Wilson, fans eagerly remarked about how much the couple ’ s only daughter looks like her dad. “ She ’ s a mini Russell! ” “ Om
